file.name: openapi.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.2
info:
  title: Example OpenAPI 3 definition. Valid.
  version: 1.0

servers:
  - url: https://development.com/v1

paths:
  '/ping':
    get:
      summary: example summary
      operationId: getPing
      responses:
        '200':
          description: example description
